Text.Page: I’m the official delegate for the affairs between Bastion and Archive Stronghold, so I’m quite busy nowadays.
You have broken both of Seren’s Seals. All that remains now is to go to Balder’s Temple.<CLOSEPAGEBUTTON>"For the federation."</CLOSEPAGEBUTTON>
<PCNAME>, thank you for showing me that the prophecy was not false.<CLOSEPAGEBUTTON>"Glad to do it."</CLOSEPAGEBUTTON>
